typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerId as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UploadedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudstreamingcustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudstreamingadd
